availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Born on October 24, 1833 in Kentucky. Worked as an agent of the Louisville and Nashville Railroad. Died on October 16,1887 in Risselville, Logan County, Kentucky.

bibl.p: Find A Grave, "WIlliam Washington Frazer (October 24, 1833 - October 16, 1887)," Memorial #119214367, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=119214367&ref=acom (accessed June 12, 2017); Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Todd, Allensville , p. 318B.
